name: Shelter (itch)
description:
Shelter is a game where you manage an animal shelter. You have a limited amount of resources to try and look after as many as animals as possible.

Made for Ludum Dare 40 and Weekly Game Jam 21.

If you are rating this game for Ludum Dare, please download 'Shelter_LD40.exe'. Otherwise you can download 'Shelter_WGJ21.exe' which is a more updated version.

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio
  • Graphics made using Aseprite and GIMP
  • Kawai Kitsune by Kevin MacLeod (http://incompetech.com)
